description: Details of water sustainability pursuant to condition 14 (Phase 3 only) of planning permission 164683VAR dated 21/06/2017 for: Minor material amendment application (under S.73) to vary condition 55 (Approved Plans and Documents) of amended outline permission P/2013/4408 dated 07/11/2013. for 'Outline planning application seeking approval of layout, scale and access for the redevelopment of the Green Man Lane Estate comprising the demolition of the multi-storey car park and surface car parking areas, Dean Hall and the existing housing stock (464 homes) and the erection of  706 new residential units and houses (to comprise a net gain of  242 dwellings) together with new and altered roads, car and cycle parking, an energy centre, public and private open space and the provision of a gym, cafe, community floorspace and enterprise units'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
